configuration.application_title: COVID-19 Medical Resource Demand Dashboard - US National

scenarios.description: This model assumes that there will be a staggered release of stay-at-home orders amongst the states and that typical hospital stays are set at 7 days. Updated 2020-06-10.
This model assumes that there will be a staggered release of stay-at-home orders amongst the states and that typical hospital stays are set at 14 days. Updated 2020-06-10.

This model assumes that there will be a staggered release of stay-at-home orders amongst the states, that there is improved access to testing, and that typical hospital stays are set at 7 days. Updated 2020-06-10.

This model assumes that there will be a staggered release of stay-at-home orders amongst the states, that there is improved access to testing, and that typical hospital stays are set at 14 days. Updated 2020-06-10.
This model assumes indefinite stay-at-home orders (ie, social distancing for the foreseeable future) with length of hospital stay set to 7 days. Updated 2020-06-10.
This model assumes indefinite stay-at-home orders (ie, social distancing for the foreseeable future) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days. Updated 2020-06-10.
